basics.label: Site Reliability Engineer
basics.summary:
I've been working in Operations for the last few years, mostly as a DevOps engineer. I really enjoy working with Cloud technologies and building cloud-native applications.
I believe I'm most proeficient and can help your company the most in the following topics:

  • Developer Experience
  • Cloud Governance and Security
  • Service Management
  • Site reliability

work.summary: Part of the SRE Delivery team, I'm helping PagerDuty deliver the best experience to their customers.
A self-organizing company, time to be my own boss.
The first startup in my professional path, feedzai - a Unicorn ðŸ¦„ - fighting financial crime and fraude
Started working for myself, providing expertise on software development and DevOps culture and best practices for international startups.
Joined the Athena project, a Bosch & Daimler effort to bring a level 4 autonomous car to the streets.
Joined Asseco PST DevOps team to help them deliver happiness to their customers
Started my first professional developer experience as a Backend Developer for Asseco PST
Moved to Prague, Czech Republic to intern for the European Commission helping them build one of the biggest european projects, Galileo Satellite System

My first real work experience. Interning as an IT Support Technician I was able to learn and explore way more than the workings of a big IT Infrastructure. I got to work with PowerShell scripting, PHP and email marketing.
